mapper.insert: insert into PMSettle (createdate,modifydate,settledate,settle_result) values (#{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{settledate, jdbcType=CHAR},#{settleResult, jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select: update PMSettle set id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT},createdate = #{createdate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},modifydate = #{modifydate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},settledate = #{settledate, jdbcType=CHAR},settle_result = #{settleResult, jdbcType=CLOB} where id = #{id}
